channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Fineract
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Fineract

item.title: CVE-2024-23537|2024-03-29T14:38:05.738Z -- Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Fineract
item.description:
Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Apache Fineract.This issue affects Apache Fineract: <1.8.5.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.9.0, which fixes the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-23538|2024-03-29T14:37:40.374Z -- Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Fineract
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Apache Fineract.This issue affects Apache Fineract: <1.8.5.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.8.5 or 1.9.0, which fix the issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-23539|2024-03-29T14:36:57.919Z -- Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Fineract
item.description:
Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Apache Fineract.This issue affects Apache Fineract: <1.8.5.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.8.5 or 1.9.0, which fix the issue.
